message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_MANDATORY_REPORTER_NOT_SET
message.locale: The reporter of the incident must be entered or indicated that they wish to remain anonymous.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_REPORTER_MORE_THAN_ONE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Only one method of adding an incident reporter can be entered. Please enter either a registered system user, a registered participant or a non registered participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_NO_REPORTERS_FOR_ANONYMOUS_INCIDENT
message.locale: The reporter of the incident may be anonymous or named, not both.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_REPORTER_NO_NAME_SPECIFIED
message.locale: When specifying a new participant as the incident reporter, a participant name must be provided.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_REPORTER_PHONE_NO_AREA_CODE
message.locale: An area code must be specified in conjunction with a phone number.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_REPORTER_AREA_CODE_NO_PHONE
message.locale: A phone number must be specified in conjunction with an area code.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XRV_ATTACHMENT_CAN_NOT_ADDED_INCIDENT_CANCELED
message.locale: This incident is '%1c', the attachment can not be added.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_CONTACT_PARTICIPANT_EMPTY
message.locale: A contact participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_MANDATORY_PARTICIPANT_NOT_SET
message.locale: An incident participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_PARTICIPANT_MORE_THAN_ONE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Only one method of adding an incident participant can be entered. Please enter either a registered system user, a registered participant or a non registered participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_PARTICIPANT_NO_NAME_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A participant name must be given when specifying a new incident participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_PARTICIPANT_PHONE_NO_AREA_CODE
message.locale: An area code must be specified in conjunction with a phone number.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_PARTICIPANT_AREA_CODE_NO_PHONE
message.locale: A phone number must be specified in conjunction with an area code.
